Campus Captains

This week we present another Phi
Psi, William Hazlett. He is president
Of the fraternity. Bill is in addition
head of the Athletic Association
Board and captain of the baseball
team which was initiated last year.
Byer a leader, Bill is captain of the
Swimming team and a champion
breaststroke. He holds the Johns
Hopkins record in the 200-yard breast,
covering the course in 2m. 47s. last
January.
Bill is also an ex-officio member
Of the Student Council and captain
Of A Company in the R. 0. T. C.

Campus Captains

This week we present another Phi
Psi, William Hazlett. He is president
Of the fraternity. Bill is in addition
head of the Athletic Association
Board and captain of the baseball
team which was initiated last year.
Byer a leader, Bill is captain of the
Swimming team and a champion
breaststroke. He holds the Johns
Hopkins record in the 200-yard breast,
covering the course in 2m. 47s. last
January.
Bill is also an ex-officio member
Of the Student Council and captain
Of A Company in the R. 0. T. C.
